description: Best tag editor I've tried. Especially when you are editing whole dirs. It takes a minute to figure out what you are doing, but once you do, you can edit tags on hundreds of files in minutes if you keep a consistant name format. Kid3 has all the features you need and is to me an absolute must have piece of software.
Superb application for manipulating metadata in audio files, has all the functionality I've needed to sort out my music collection. Kudos to the developers!

Just what I needed. I tried a lot of MP3 taggers over the last couple days, this is the only one which reads my external drives weather they are NTFS or EXT. 

There are two versions of this program on snap, this one works.
Très belle alternative à mp3tag lorsque j'utilisais encore Windaube. Renseignements à la volée, ajout de pochette simple et rapide, utilisation aisée.
impossible de le mettre en français dans neon alors qu'il l'est spontanément dand kubuntu 20.04 LTS
